ModMetaData.name: 13✖13 Cell Prefabs 预制房间
ModMetaData.author: trigger
ModMetaData.description:
需要Alpha Prefabs https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3070780021
13✖13 预制房间，原版阿尔法预制体很多不规则建筑，导致实用性很差，现在通过全新的13✖13 预制房间所有房间都是严格的正方形！
一共添加了67个方形预制房间。
支持MOD Dubs Rimatomics 边缘核能 Rimefeller 边缘石化 Dubs Bad Hygiene 边缘卫生 Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire VE帝国扩展 Vanilla Furniture Expanded VE家具扩展 SRTS Expanded SRTS飞船
部分设计来自B站up主 爱盘点的阿松 感谢up主的分享 围观视频：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1sb421b7EW
支持简体中文，繁体中文和英语.
Alpha Prefabs Needed https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3070780021
13×13 Prefab Rooms Many original Alpha Prefab structures are irregularly shaped, resulting in poor practicality. Now, with the new 13×13 prefab rooms, all rooms are strictly square!
Total of 67 square-shaped prefab rooms added.
Supports Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and English.
Supported MODs:
Dubs Rimatomics Rimefeller Dubs Bad Hygiene Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire Vanilla Furniture Expanded SRTS Expanded
更新日志： 1.0.0 2025-5-16 首次上传mod 1.0.1 2025-5-16 修正了XML导致红字的问题，删除了一个不兼容建筑，添加了4个预制房间 1.0.2 2025-5-16 改用8深度的PNG图片，优化了包体大小. 1.1.0 2025-5-17 加入翻译文件,修改了Mod预览图
给其他开发者看的：如果你也想用Alpha Prefabs制作建筑，可以使用本模组自带的两个开发者快捷命令"Copy XML to Clipboard" 和"Copy Patch XML to Clipboard",前者可以复制出价值，mod名和科技名，后者会自动生成Patch文件(需要自己改建筑名称)。
